reviews.title: Horrible paid ring tone app
reviews.comment: Really bad quality and length of ringtones - Zedge is 1000x better and costs nothing. Charging money for ringtones is just ridiculous. Totally not worth it and utterly disappointed.
reviews.author: Basil Khan

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Dont buy it. They charge for the ringtones. Thats really cheeky. Its a con

reviews.title: Costly ringtones
reviews.comment: Never thought the ringtones would cost making this app useless when the internet alows free downloading.
reviews.author: James Lamb

reviews.title: Don\'t lie!
reviews.comment: If you want to download ringtones there is a charge so it is NOT free. My phone kept crashing all time this app installed. Stopped as soon as removed.

reviews.title: Poor

reviews.comment: Do not buy. Uninstalled ASAP. Kept closing down as soon as you open the app. Really poor.

reviews.title: Wicked and wild
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for an app with a wide choice of different types of ringtones. Not just commercial stuff. This is it

reviews.title: Nothing new here.
reviews.comment: Zedge is way better and is free. If you want your favourite songs as ringtones then put them on your phone and set as a ringtone. Love a song that much and you will probably own it anyway.
reviews.author: Sally West

reviews.title: Why pay?
reviews.comment: None of the ringtones are free! Terrible paid ringtone app. I can get more music and better quality from a free app. Uninstalled immediately.
reviews.author: Nivia Jones
